photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Artist.title: Artist
Artist.description: Represents an artist, actor, or DJ profile.

genre.description: The genre of music or performance the artist specializes in.

country.description: The country the artist is from.

imageUrl.description: URL of the artist's profile image.

description.description: A detailed description of the artist.

socialMediaLinks.description: Array of social media links for the artist

date.description: The date and time of the event.

artistIds.description: References to Artists. (Relationship: Event N:N Artist)

description.description: A detailed description of the event.

imageURL.description: URL of the event's promotional image.

Partner.title: Partner
Partner.description: Represents a partner or sponsor of the platform.

name.description: The name of the partner organization.

description.description: A description of the partner and their relationship with the platform.

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: Represents an administrator user with access to the admin panel. Extends UserProfile.

Content.title: Content
Content.description: Represents curated content managed by the admin, to be displayed across the platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the content item.

contentType.description: The type of content (e.g., 'Hero Section', 'Featured Artist', 'Latest Event', 'Partner Showcase').

contentData.description: A JSON string containing the actual content data, specific to the contentType.

pageLocation.description: The page where this content is displayed (e.g., 'Home', 'Artists', 'Events', 'Partners').

order.description: The order in which this content is displayed on the page.

isActive.description: A flag indicating whether the content is currently active and visible on the platform.

/admins/{adminId}.description: Collection of administrator user IDs. Existence of a document with the user's ID grants admin privileges.

/artists/{artistId}.description: Collection of artist profiles. Accessible and manageable by admins.

/events/{eventId}.description: Collection of event listings. Accessible and manageable by admins.

/partners/{partnerId}.description: Collection of partner profiles. Accessible and manageable by admins.

/content/{contentId}.description: Collection of curated content items. Accessible and manageable by admins.

/users/{userId}.description: Collection of all user profiles. A document is created here upon user registration.
